mapper.select: select dongcode.dongCode, dongcode.sidoName, dongcode.gugunName, dongcode.dongName, dong_view_top_5.views from (select dongCode, count(*) views from dong_view_history where createdTime > date_add(now(), interval - 7 day) group by dongCode limit 5) dong_view_top_5, dongcode where dong_view_top_5.dongCode = dongcode.dongCode order by views desc;
